short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds J/K movements and 'Enter' bindings to some popular web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add j/k bindings to popular web sites.  Also, "Enter" activates the selected element.  Useful for super-fast browsing of Google/Youtube/DuckDuckGo search results, Reddit, Twitter, Facebook and others.  Can be configured to provide smooth scrolling via j/k on all websites.

You'll probably need to visit the home page (link below).
